tool_description: Compares analytical results between multiple samples or sample groups to identify similarities, differences, and trends for geological interpretation.

comparison_samples.description: Array of samples to compare against reference

error_messages: Insufficient samples: At least one reference and one comparison sample are required.
Overlapping sample sets: Reference and comparison samples cannot overlap.
Missing comparison parameters: At least one parameter must be specified for comparison.
Invalid similarity_threshold: Must be between 0 and 1.
Analytical data missing: Some samples lack data for the requested comparison parameters.
usage: Provide reference_samples, comparison_samples, and comparison_parameters; optionally set similarity_threshold. The tool compares samples and identifies patterns.

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores between reference and comparison samples

significant_differences.description: Parameters showing significant differences between groups

grouping_suggestions.description: Suggested sample groupings based on similarity

comparison_summary.description: Summary of key similarities and differences
